post.description: Returns an auth token to build basicAuth for the provided credentials

user_id.description: the user_id makes the 'username' for basicAuth

access_token.description: the access_token makes the 'password' for basicAuth

get.description: Gets `user + contact` objects for current logged-in user

parameters.name: X-Caliopen-PI
parameters.description: The PI range requested in form of `1;100`

post.description: Create a new User with provided credentials

location.description: url to retrieve new user's infos at /users/{user_id}

default.description: route not implemented, should raise an error
route not implemented, should raise an error

get.description: Check if an username is available for creation within Caliopen instance
Returns contacts belonging to current user according to given parameters

parameters.name: X-Caliopen-PI
parameters.description: The PI range requested in form of `1;100`

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of contacts to return per page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of pages to skip from the response

total.description: number of contacts found for current user for the given parameters

post.description: Create a new contact for the logged-in user

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: the contact to create

location.description: url to retrieve new contact's infos at /contacts/{contact_id}

default.description: route not implemented, should raise an error

patch.description: update a contact with rfc5789 and rfc7396 specifications

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: the patch to apply. See 'Caliopen Patch RFC' within /doc directory.

204.description: Update successful. No body is returned.

403.description: Forbidden patch. Server is refusing to apply the given patch's properties to this ressource

422.description: json is valid but patch was semantically malformed or unprocessable

parameters.name: vcard
parameters.description: the v file to upload

422.description: File valid but we can create the new contact

get.description: Returns the list of discussions for current user according to given filter

parameters.name: X-Caliopen-PI
parameters.description: The PI range requested in form of `0;100`

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of discussions to return per page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of discussions to skip for pagination

total.description: number of discussions found for current user for the given parameters

get.description: Returns the list of messages for current user according to given parameters/filter

parameters.name: X-Caliopen-PI
parameters.description: The PI range requested in form of `0;100`

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: filter messages belonging to a specific discussion

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of messages to return per page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of pages to skip from the response

total.description: number of messages found for user for the given parameters

post.description: Create a new Message (draft) for an user

422.description: Unprocessable entity. Parameters were valid but the server was unable to create the draft (probably because of a semantically erroneous document, like an empty draft)

patch.description: update a contact with rfc5789 and rfc7396 specifications

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: the patch to apply. See 'Caliopen Patch RFC' within /doc directory.

204.description: Update successful. No body is returned.

403.description: Forbidden patch. Server is refusing to apply the given patch's properties to this ressource

422.description: json is valid but patch was semantically malformed or unprocessable

delete.description: Delete a message belonging to an user

204.description: Successful deletion. No body is returned

403.description: Forbidden action. Server is refusing to delete this ressource

post.description: send an order to execute one (or many) action(s) for the given message : send, etc. A successful execution of the action will probably modify one or more message's attribute(s)

200.description: action(s) successfully executed. Message is sent back with its modified attributes (if any)

403.description: Forbidden action. Server is refusing to execute the given action(s) to this ressource

422.description: json is valid but action was semantically malformed or unprocessable

post.description: (for draft only) upload a file to server and add attachment reference to the draft.

parameters.name: attachment
parameters.description: the attachment file to upload

201.description: File uploaded sucessfully. Backend sends back attachment's url.

parameters.name: attachment_index
parameters.description: attachment position within message

200.description: the raw mime part, in the 'content-transfer-encoding' format of the part.

delete.description: (for drafts only) delete temporary file and remove attachment reference from the draft.

parameters.name: attachment_index
parameters.description: attachment position within message

204.description: Successful deletion. No body is returned

403.description: Forbidden action. Server is refusing to delete this ressource

get.description: Returns tags visible to current user according to given parameters

total.description: number of tags found for user for the given parameters

post.description: Create a new Tag for an user

location.description: url to retrieve new tag's infos at /tags/{name}

delete.description: Delete a tag belonging to an user

get.description: Returns devices belonging to current user according to given parameters

parameters.name: X-Caliopen-PI
parameters.description: The PI range requested in form of `1;100`

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of devices to return per page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of pages to skip from the response

total.description: number of devices found for current user for the given parameters

post.description: Create a new device for the logged-in user

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: the device to create

location.description: url to retrieve new device's infos at /devices/{device_id}

default.description: route not implemented, should raise an error

patch.description: update a device with rfc5789 and rfc7396 specifications

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: the patch to apply. See 'Caliopen Patch RFC' within /doc directory.

204.description: Update successful. No body is returned.

422.description: patch was semantically malformed or unprocessable

get.description: returns the list of user's local identities

total.description: number of local identities found for user

post.description: create a new remote identity for an user

location.description: url to retrieve new remote identity's infos at /remotes/{identifier}

basicAuth.description: HTTP Basic Authentication. `Password` is the `access_token` return by /authentications and `Username` is the `user_id` returned by /authentications
